import React from "react"; import "./my-groups.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Button, FormGroup, Form, Input, InputGroup } from "reactstrap"; import "../assets/css/custom.css"; import Navbar from "../common/navbar/navbar.js"; import Footer from "../common/footer/footer"; import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar'; import Chip from '@material-ui/core/Chip'; class CreateNewGroupPage extends React.Component { render() { return (
} label="Deletable Chip" onDelete={handleDelete} className={classes.chip} />
); } } export default CreateNewGroupPage;
